name: TypeCast (itch)
description:
Type the strange and arcane characters: A, X, B, P, 8, and Space to vanquish as many evil word monsters as possible before your inevitable fall...

Made for the 74th Mini Jam, theme: Chaos, Limitation: Only inputs are P, A, X, B, 8, Space

Font from Vladimir Nikolic at https://www.dafont.com/players.font

All other assets, (code, art, and sound) were created by me using beepbox.co, aseprite, and some shaders
